name: Chief
details: High-order cleansing; powerful wish anchor (7-Star). Use for major cleansing and protection protocols.

name: Nine Heavens
details: Visualization and higher inspiration; guidance channel. Use for insight and creativity.

name: Nine Earth
details: Accumulation, healing, material stability; use for steady health and assets.

name: Great Moon
details: Knowledge, information, research; use to download study and problem-solving insight.

name: Six Harmony
details: Relationship & harmonization frequency; use for reconciliation and group harmony.

name: Black Tortoise
details: Mind-influence and psychic sensitivity; use cautiously and pair with grounding/clearing.

name: White Tiger
details: Stamina, assertive force, clearing energy; use for removing blocks and execution.

name: Surging Snake
details: Sensing environment, networking and nuance; use for strategy and finding helpers.

name: Red Phoenix
details: Power of speech and articulation; craft spoken commands carefully (verbal karma matters).

name: Hook
details: Ability to 'jump chapters' / change trajectory quickly; use for major shifts when portal/alignment exists.

name: Assistant
details: Wisdom / foresight; improves decision-making. Use with Moon constellations for downloads.

name: Ambassador
details: Opens fortune channels; luck catalyst. Use with Green Dragon constellations for luck openings.

name: Pillar
details: Support/partnership; brings allies and structural help. Use with metal constellations.

name: Grass/Astrid
details: Wealth frequency; steady income flows. Combine with Pleiades/Grain for wealth protocols.

name: Grain
details: Restoration, systemic reboot and deep healing; used for frequency reboot protocols.

name: Green Dragon
details: Members: horn, neck, foundation, house, heart, tail, basket — growth/fortune group; pairs with Ambassador for luck.

name: Fire group
details: Members: tail, room, beak, wing — often used with Destructor for protection/crisis aversion.

name: Moon group
details: Members: heart, danger, net, bow — secondary protocols for restoration and deep resets.

name: Sun components
details: Members: house, void, pleiades, star — used for cleansing & void work (void carries debris away).

name: Metal group
details: Members: neck, ox, mound, ghost — metal constellations support Pillar/support protocols.

name: Void
details: Sun component used to remove/clear negative energy; cited in 23 Oct cleansing.

name: Net
details: Moon constellation used to catch and remove attachments during cleansing.

name: Wing
details: Fire constellation used to expand protective shield (used with Destructor).

name: Life door
details: Open opportunities and life power — used to open energetic pathways.

name: Death door
details: Endings — useful to end cycles and for cleansing (explicitly used on 23 Oct).

name: Fear door
details: Address anxiety and internal blocks; used with emotional alchemy protocols.

name: Delusion door
details: Clear confusion; use with clarity/wisdom protocols.

name: Destiny palace
details: Core life theme / anchor. Sit with back-to when activating destiny-level work.

name: Wealth palace
details: Finances and material resources. Target wealth protocols when formations land on this palace.

name: Career palace
details: Career / public success. Use Hero + neck/danger formations for visibility in career palace.

name: Family/Relationship palace
details: Personal relationships. Use Heart + Pillar + Net constellations for healing/mending.

name: Knowledge/Study palace
details: Learning & downloads. Use Assistant + Moon/Great Moon hours for study downloads.

name: Karmic/Subconscious palace
details: Clear old patterns. Use Hook + Bird + consecration/cleansing protocols.

name: 2025-10-23 05:00-07:00 (local)
details: Void constellation + 7-Star Chief — primary cleansing session (void carries debris away).

name: 2025-10-24 15:00-17:00 (local)
details: Chief + Net constellation — secondary cleansing (net catches attachments).

name: Daily 09:00-11:00
details: Destructor formation — protection window (example repeated as daily protective portal).

name: 13:00-15:00 (ping wei)
details: Green Dragon return example — useful for career/wealth depending on palace overlap.
Flying bird formation (north) — evening formation used for spiritual / karma-work examples.

name: Protection / Crisis Aversion
details: Star(s): Destructor; Modifiers: Sun/Fire constellations (wing/tail). Steps: back-to-destiny palace; pick 9–11am formation; command + seal; physical protection. Template: 'I command the Destructor to form a shield around [me/place], repelling all malice. I anchor this with [exchange]. So it is done.'

name: Cleansing / Frequency Reboot
details: Star(s): 7‑Star Chief; Modifiers: Void, Pleiades. Steps: prepare; activate chief; visualize debris to void; secure exchange; seal. Template: 'I command the 7‑Star Chief together with the Void constellation to sweep impurities from [me/place] into the void. So it is done.'

name: Wisdom / Quantum Vision
details: Star(s): Assistant; Modifiers: Moon constellations. Steps: activate assistant + listen/download; act on guidance. Template: 'I activate the Assistant and Moon constellations to sharpen foresight for [topic]. So it is done.'

name: Luck / Fortune Catalyst
details: Star(s): Ambassador; Modifiers: Green Dragon group. Steps: activate ambassador + green dragon; declare intention; take action. Template: 'I command the Ambassador with Green Dragon constellations to open fortunate channels for [goal]. So it is done.'

name: Visibility / Influence
details: Star(s): Hero; Modifiers: neck,danger,beak,ghost. Steps: activate hero formation; speak from truth; take aligned outreach. Template: 'I activate the Hero formation to amplify authentic visibility for [project]. So it is done.'

name: Wealth / Windfalls
details: Star(s): Grass/Astrid + Pleiades/Grain; Modifiers: Surging Snake may be used. Steps: cleanse + anchor exchange + pitch/action. Template: 'I command the Wealth star to magnetize reliable income for [goal], anchored with [exchange]. So it is done.'

name: Consecration / Blessing
details: Star(s): any aligned star per chosen hour. Steps: cleanse space/object; pick consecration hour; infuse intent; seal. Template: 'I consecrate this [object] to hold the energy of [intention]. So it is done.'

name: Protection Shield
details: I command the Destructor to form a shield around [me/place], repelling all malice. I anchor with [exchange]. So it is done.

name: Cleansing Void Sweep
details: I command the 7-Star Chief and Void to sweep impurities from [me/place] into the void. So it is done.

name: Wisdom Download
details: I activate the Assistant and Moon constellations to reveal right next steps on [topic]. So it is done.

name: Luck Opening
details: I command the Ambassador and Green Dragon to open fortunate channels for [goal]. So it is done.

name: Visibility Boost
details: I activate the Hero formation to amplify authentic visibility for [project]. So it is done.

name: Wealth Magnet
details: I command the Wealth star to magnetize reliable income for [goal], anchored with [exchange]. So it is done.

name: Consecrate Item/Water
details: I consecrate this [item/water] to hold the energy of [intention]. So it is done.
Prepare: sit back-to your destiny palace; set intention and center breath.
Activate star: call the Chief (7-Star) or chosen star. Example phrase: 'I activate the 7-Star Chief to sweep impurities from [me/place]'.
Visualize debris leaving into the void; imagine Net constellation catching and removing attachments.
State equivalent exchange: declare a small exchange (donation, service, discipline).
Seal the command: 'I seal this across spirit, heaven, earth and human realms. So it is done.'

name: Qimen plotter / manifesting calendar
details: Instructor site / plotter to highlight formations on your chart (interactive).

name: Tongshu almanac
details: Precomputed yearly calendar for planning portal days/hours.

name: QIMEN FULL TRANSCRIPT - TOC.md
details: Quick section pointers and activation windows (in repo).

name: QIMEN FULL TRANSCRIPT - Detailed Outline.md
details: Structured outline with command templates and protocols (in repo).

name: Major-points-organized.md files
details: Per-session detailed extracts and examples (in repo).

name: Destructor formation 9am-11am
details: Between 9am to 11am, there's a very, very special formation using the Destructor Star.

name: Cleansing 23 Oct
details: I command the 7‑Star Chief to sweep all impurities...into the void.

name: Command structure
details: Activate / Define / Amplify / Secure / Seal — that's the command structure.
